name: The Swarm
description: This variation on a Honey Bee cocktail cuts the sweetness of rum and honey with Cynar.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce fresh lemon juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the honey and warm water in the bottom of a cocktail shaker and stir vigorously until completely combined.
Add the white rum, lemon juice, Cynar. Fill cocktail shaker with ice and shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into two coupe glasses and serve immediately.
